# Digital Rain

Random pattern with vote blurring for smoother, more connected lines.

## Settings

```
pattern: random
numPoints: 60
threshold: 10
thetaStep: 0.5
opacity: 0.45
colorMode: ocean
useCoarseBinning: false
useDynamicThreshold: false
useBlurring: true
blurRadius: 2.5
darkMode: true
```

---

*Generated by Hough Waves Generator*
